code: import*as apiUserUtil from"../util/user_util";export var RECEIVE_USER="RECEIVE_USER";var receiveUser=function receiveUser(user){return{type:RECEIVE_USER,user:user};};export var fetchUser=function fetchUser(userId){return function(dispatch){return apiUserUtil.getUser(userId).then(function(user){return dispatch(receiveUser(user));});};};
